TopicTitle: Cannot leave or launch craft from SPH or VAB

Articles.Content:
No mod conflicts. Running as admin.

Game loads perfectly and all patches are applied. Started fresh game - no saves

Tried in 32 and 64 same problem.

Modified and tested all video settings.

Never had this issue before.

Enter Vab and SPH just fine and can build craft/ also loaded default craft

Cannot launch any craft nor exit out of the hangars once I load in using the top right buttons. Must force close.

Reloaded all fresh .25 compatible only mods
Same thing happens to me on my Macbook. I'm building in VAB or SPH and can't launch the craft or exit it.

Just in case - are you using RealChute mod? One of recent versions (pre-last one, xxx.2) caused some bugs, including this one. Though usually bugs manifested when switching to launched vessel, but described one also occured. If yes, try disabling it and upgrading to most recent build.
In my case I'm just using Toolbar, KAS, Universal Storage, MechJeb & ShipManifest. Clean KSP works without any problems, it's probably one of the mods.
Please, please, *PLEASE* follow the instructions in the "How to get support" sticky thread in this sub-forum.
